text: e One of the insights in Economics is that there usually exist trade-offs. @ In the case of production there is а K trade-off in inputs: to produce a B certain amount efficiently you can use lots of labour and reduce your inputs of capital (A), or you could do the reverse (B). There are many combinations of the two which can ^ — achieve а given end. L e The isoquant is an analytical description of that trade-off. It illustrates the flexibility of the production technology.
